Hi, I'm Brianna Blackett, your host for season three of Too Much. The switch. I started out as a journalist. I lived abroad and traveled the world, helping to cover breaking news. I co-founded an international news organization, but this is becoming apparent as a solo parent to my two kids.
It is my working life has needed to change over and over again. And I'm not alone. Join me as I interview eight extraordinary women who made the switch from one career to another and found success. We'll also find out how defying the suffocating stereotypes women face at work helped them get there.
She was winning Olympic gold medals and world championships in the pool. But at the glittering peak of her career, she was burned out. At age 23, Jian Rui retired from competitive swimming, and she chased new adrenaline highs as a TV presenter. But when this career path landed her in a job that didn't fit, and saw her receiving harsh criticism from viewers, Jian pivoted again. And this time, it was a switch you would never see coming. Today, Jian joins us to travel through her pivots and explore how, at each turn, being too invested has seen her rise to dazzling heights, and how putting aside ego has given her the courage to change lanes and have Thanks a crack at something new. for watching!
